titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 2752) to declare that certain lands be held in trust for the Quinault Indian Nation, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1083.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 230 - 115 (Record Vote No: 449).

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 2752 (Quinault Indian Nation lands).
